entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Occasional local drifting snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snow level rising to 600 metres after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
